text: Ceratogyrus meridionalis, commonly known as the Zimbabwe grey baboon tarantula or the grey mustard baboon, is a species of tarantula. It is found in Malawi and Mozambique. == See also == * List of Theraphosidae species ==References== Category:Theraphosidae Category:Spiders of Africa Category:Spiders described in 1907
title: Ceratogyrus meridionalis
